```{r, include=FALSE}
library(admixtools)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Plot admixturegraph

```{r}
plot_graph(igraph1)
```


## Admixturegraph on a map

```{r}
## basic example code
plot_graph_map(igraph1, anno_v41)
```
